description: This week I've dug up some extra special footage of Thomas from the War Chest to share with you. This was his second solo and we've never released it anywhere before today. So, kick back, get your lube ready and join Thomas for one hell of a performance as he mans the camera while he waits on me. Thomas finally got tired of waiting and shot this solo himself while I was off busy with some other boys. This hung, muscled up man is sure to be just what you need to unwind from your holiday activities. I love the way he talks so much shit, don't you? Mmm.
title: Thomas
